article_title: US call at UN for Gaza truce linked to hostages blocked
sentence: Washington  has  made  clear  that  it  expects  Israel  to  lessen  the  intensity  of  its  offensive  in  Gaza,  where  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  at  least  31,988  people  -  mainly  women  and  children  -  have  been  killed  since  the  war  began  on  7  October.
